keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

headline.main: NEWS FROM PORT ROYAL.; More U.S. Forces Landed on Tybee Island. THE FORTIFICATIONS BEING STRENGTHENED, Gen. Viele's Expedition Ready to Start. Its Destination Probably Brunswick or Fernandina. Cotton and Forage Found at Port Royal.

docs.snippet: A most enthusiastic mass meeting of citizens of all parties filled Cooper Institute to overflowing last evening, in testimony to the popular indorsement of the nomination of Hon. GEORGE OPDYKE to the Mayoralty.

headline.main: ANOTHER OPDYKE RATIFICATION.; Enthusiastic Meeting of all Parties at Cooper Institute. Spicy Resolutions and Stirring Speeches. Addresses by Judge Cowles, David Budley Field, Henry J. Raymond, James A. Briggs, and Others. SERENADE TO MR. OPDYKE.

docs.lead_paragraph: A most enthusiastic mass meeting of citizens of all parties filled Cooper Institute to overflowing last evening, in testimony to the popular indorsement of the nomination of Hon. GEORGE OPDYKE to the Mayoralty.
